description: This file is a Bash shell script for managing debug tools in a software project. It includes functions to download, set environment paths, and clean up various debug utilities such as lsof, gperftools, strace, and gdb, with custom logging and conditionals for file system checks.

methods.name: echo_t
methods.description: A utility function to print timestamped log messages.

methods.name: clean_debug_tool
methods.description: Cleans up downloaded debug tools; can clean all or specified tools.

methods.name: set_path_variable_lsof
methods.description: Adds lsof path to environment PATH if available.

methods.name: set_path_variable_gperftools
methods.description: Configures environment variables for gperftools, including PATH and LD_LIBRARY_PATH.

methods.name: set_path_variable_strace
methods.description: Adds strace path to environment PATH if available.

methods.name: set_path_variable_gdb
methods.description: Adds gdb path to environment PATH if available.

methods.name: set_all_path_variables
methods.description: Calls all individual set path functions to configure environment for all tools.
